name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Not Now - Close distracting tabs instantly

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A productivity tool that prevents you from accessing distracting pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically closes the tab you try to access a blocked site from.
